ygData.subject: Re: Skills.. now what
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok the reason u can t find a map of Permafrost is becuase there isn t one that i know of yet...perma is too tough to get into...on the povar server there are
ygData.messageBody:
Ok the reason u can't find a map of Permafrost is becuase there isn't one
that i know of yet...perma is too tough to get into...on the povar server
there are atleast 4 lvl50's and about 20 lvl 40+
you should see a map of that place soon..
but i would not go there till atleast 25 with a strong party and even then u
wont be able to get very deep.
my suggestion to u for faster levels is to kill aviak guards in east
karana..they are great exp decent loot and no trains....just watch out for
cyclops and such...
good luck and safe hunting


Genadarilo of Povar
24lvl warrior

>training points into?
>
>OH! btw.. can anyone tell me anything about permafrost can't find a map

>
>Thanks
>Azlana
